DOC.brief_summary: Non-interventional,observational and retrospective study assessing the therapeutic and diagnostic attitude followed in primary care for a hypertensive patient depending on his degree of blood pressure control.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Hypertension in Primary Care in Spain
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of primary hypertension and/or treated for hypertension for one year or more Clinical data of blood pressure measures for the last 12+/ 2 months before inclusion. Secondary Hypertension Physical or psychological impairment for the understanding of the information to be given to the patient
